## Do-Pair-Share solution{style="font-size: 0.7em"}
1. `$ git init test`
2. `$ cd test`
3. `$ touch small_file.txt`, `$ touch large_file.txt`, `$ touch .gitignore`
4. `$ git add small_file.txt` `$ git commit -m "my first commit"`
5. self-explanatory
6. `$ git add .gitignore` `$ git commit -m "ignore large file"`
